features.name: Relentless
features.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you may make a Tusk attack.

features.name: Tusk
features.description: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage. If you moved at least 20 ft. before making this attack, increase the damage by 3 (1d6)
